00038 /*
00039  * Convert a wide string to a float.
00040  */
00041 static float toFloat(const wstring &str)
00042 {
00043     string mbs = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(str);
00044     double d = strtod(mbs.c_str(),NULL);
00045     float rv = d;
00046     return rv;
00047 }
00048 
00049 /*
00050  * Convert a wide string to a float.
00051  */
00052 static int toInt(const wstring &str)
00053 {
00054     return (int) toFloat(str);
00055 }
00056 
00057 /*
00058  * Extract the parameters from the parameter file.
00059  */
00060 bool MAS5ParameterExtraction::ExtractParameters
00061 (
00062     const char *fileName, 
00063     CExpStatAlgSettings &parameters
00064 )
00065 {
00066     // Read the file
00067     ParameterFileData paramData;
00068     ParameterFileReader reader;
00069     if (reader.Read(fileName, paramData) == false)
00070         return false;
00071 
00072     // Map the parameters from the file to the MAS5 parameter object.
00073     for (ParameterTypeList::iterator it=paramData.Parameters().begin(); it!=paramData.Parameters().end(); it++)
00074     {
00075         if (it->name == L"Alpha1")
00076             parameters.Alpha1 = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00077 
00078         else if (it->name == L"Alpha2")
00079             parameters.Alpha2 = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00080 
00081         else if (it->name == L"ScaleFactor")
00082         {
00083             parameters.BaseScaleFactor = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00084             parameters.ScaleFactor = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00085         }
00086 
00087         else if (it->name == L"BHCoef")
00088             parameters.BHCoef = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00089 
00090         else if (it->name == L"BiasCorrect")
00091             parameters.BiasCorrect = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00092 
00093         else if (it->name == L"BLCoef")
00094             parameters.BLCoef = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00095 
00096         else if (it->name == L"CMultiplier")
00097             parameters.CMultiplier = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00098 
00099         else if (it->name == L"ContrastTau")
00100             parameters.ContrastTau = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00101 
00102         else if (it->name == L"Delta")
00103             parameters.Delta = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00104 
00105         else if (it->name == L"Epsilon")
00106             parameters.Epsilon = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00107 
00108         else if (it->name == L"EpsilonAvgLogInten")
00109             parameters.EpsilonAvgLogInten = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00110 
00111         else if (it->name == L"EpsilonAvgLogRatio")
00112             parameters.EpsilonAvgLogRatio = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00113 
00114         else if (it->name == L"EpsilonGammas")
00115             parameters.EpsilonGammas = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00116 
00117         else if (it->name == L"EpsilonSB")
00118             parameters.EpsilonSB = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00119 
00120         else if (it->name == L"Gamma1H")
00121             parameters.Gamma1H = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00122 
00123         else if (it->name == L"Gamma1L")
00124             parameters.Gamma1L = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00125 
00126         else if (it->name == L"Gamma2H")
00127             parameters.Gamma2H = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00128 
00129         else if (it->name == L"Gamma2L")
00130             parameters.Gamma2L = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00131 
00132         else if (it->name == L"IntensityHighPercent")
00133             parameters.IntensityHighPercent = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00134 
00135         else if (it->name == L"IntensityLowPercent")
00136             parameters.IntensityLowPercent = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00137 
00138         else if (it->name == L"NoiseFrac")
00139             parameters.NoiseFrac = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00140 
00141         else if (it->name == L"NormFactor")
00142             parameters.NormFactor = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00143 
00144         //else if (it->name == L"")
00145         //    parameters.NormGenes = ;
00146 
00147         else if (it->name == L"NormMaskFile")
00148             parameters.NormMaskFile = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(it->currentValue);
00149 
00150         else if (it->name == L"NFMethod")
00151         {
00152             if (it->currentValue == L"DEFINED_NORMALIZATION_FACTOR")
00153                 parameters.NormMethod = CExpStatAlgSettings::DEFINED_NORMALIZATION_FACTOR;
00154 
00155             else if (it->currentValue == L"NORM_TO_ALL_PROBE_SETS")
00156                 parameters.NormMethod = CExpStatAlgSettings::NORM_TO_ALL_PROBE_SETS;
00157 
00158             else if (it->currentValue == L"NORM_TO_SELECTED_PROBE_SETS")
00159                 parameters.NormMethod = CExpStatAlgSettings::NORM_TO_SELECTED_PROBE_SETS;
00160 
00161             else
00162                 parameters.NormMethod = CExpStatAlgSettings::DEFINED_NORMALIZATION_FACTOR;
00163         }
00164 
00165         else if (it->name == L"NumberBGCells")
00166             parameters.NumberBGCells = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00167 
00168         else if (it->name == L"NumberHorZones")
00169             parameters.NumberHorZones = toInt(it->currentValue);
00170 
00171         else if (it->name == L"NumberVertZones")
00172             parameters.NumberVertZones = toInt(it->currentValue);
00173 
00174         else if (it->name == L"Perturbation")
00175             parameters.Perturbation = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00176 
00177         else if (it->name == L"ProbeMaskFile")
00178             parameters.ProbeMaskFile = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(it->currentValue);
00179 
00180         else if (it->name == L"RelConfInterval")
00181             parameters.RelConfInterval = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00182 
00183         else if (it->name == L"SaturatedIntensity")
00184             parameters.SaturatedIntensity = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00185 
00186         else if (it->name == L"HPSaturatedIntensity")
00187             parameters.HPSaturatedIntensity = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00188 
00189         //else if (it->name == L"")
00190         //    parameters.ScaleGenes = ;
00191 
00192         else if (it->name == L"ScaleMaskFile")
00193             parameters.ScaleMaskFile = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(it->currentValue);
00194 
00195         else if (it->name == L"ScaleTau")
00196             parameters.ScaleTau = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00197 
00198         else if (it->name == L"SFMethod")
00199         {
00200             if (it->currentValue == L"DEFINED_SCALING_FACTOR")
00201                 parameters.SFMethod = CExpStatAlgSettings::DEFINED_SCALING_FACTOR;
00202 
00203             else if (it->currentValue == L"SCALE_TO_ALL_PROBE_SETS")
00204                 parameters.SFMethod = CExpStatAlgSettings::SCALE_TO_ALL_PROBE_SETS;
00205 
00206             else if (it->currentValue == L"SCALE_TO_SELECTED_PROBE_SETS")
00207                 parameters.SFMethod = CExpStatAlgSettings::SCALE_TO_SELECTED_PROBE_SETS;
00208 
00209             else
00210                 parameters.SFMethod = CExpStatAlgSettings::DEFINED_SCALING_FACTOR;
00211         }
00212 
00213         else if (it->name == L"SmoothFactorBG")
00214             parameters.SmoothFactorBG = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00215 
00216         else if (it->name == L"STP")
00217             parameters.STP = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00218 
00219         else if (it->name == L"Tau")
00220             parameters.Tau = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00221 
00222         else if (it->name == L"TGT")
00223             parameters.TGT = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00224 
00225         else if (it->name == L"TuningConstantCAvgLogInten")
00226             parameters.TuningConstantCAvgLogInten = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00227 
00228         else if (it->name == L"TuningConstantCAvgLogRatio")
00229             parameters.TuningConstantCAvgLogRatio = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00230 
00231         else if (it->name == L"TuningConstantCGammas")
00232             parameters.TuningConstantCGammas = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00233 
00234         else if (it->name == L"TuningConstantCSB")
00235             parameters.TuningConstantCSB = toFloat(it->currentValue);
00236     }
00237 
00238     return true;
00239 }
